value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|If I wasn't looking at it with my own
eyes, I wouldn't believe it... And even
now, I'm not sure I do.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|It's just as it seems, Commander...
This is the Aether Keep left behind by
Líf, first king of Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|It's just as mother used to tell us
when we were little. A castle that
flies as freely as a bird...$k$pSeeing it is like seeing a dream!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You're right, Sharena. It's just as
mother said. I was certain those were
mere fairy tales...$k$pNever did I imagine we would find it
lying dormant all the way out here.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I can't help but wonder about the
source who gave us the information
that led us here...$k$pJust who could it have been?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Alfonse! Commander Anna! Over
here—you can see the whole thing!$k$p$EFace|It's been untouched for so long, it's
practically in ruins. What do you think
it was used for?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Battling in the heavens.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Huh?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|A fire appears to have consumed
much of the castle's library, but a
trace of literature remained.$k$pIt seems that the ancient Askrans
used to travel the skies and do battle
with Aether Keeps in other realms.$k$pThe ultimate goal was to soar ever
higher into the sky. It was a battle for
power over the heavens.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Amazing! They waged battle so high
up?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|That's right. It's also said they
employed special weaponry, both
offensive as well as defensive.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Weapons on a castle? That sounds
incredible! Do you think there are any
still lying around?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Good question, Sharena. I'm sure
any we can salvage will come in
handy later.$k$pLet's give this place a proper look
right away.$k$p
